http_proxy.description: Override the HTTPS proxy used when provisioning kind clusters.

https_proxy.description: Override the HTTP proxy used when provisioning kind clusters.

kubeconfig.description: Sets kubeconfig path instead of $KUBECONFIG or $HOME/.kube/config

no_proxy.description: Override the NO_PROXY list used when provisioning kind clusters.

provider.description: The provider used to run the containers. Can be either `docker` or `podman`

verbosity.description: Sets the logging verbosity. larger number means more logs.

ca_certificate_data.description: The base64-encoded CA Certificate used by the API Server

client_certificate_data.description: The base64-encoded client certificate data for connecting the cluster

client_key_data.description: The base64-encoded client private key data for connecting the cluster

config.description: the cluster config as documented on https://kind.sigs.k8s.io/docs/user/configuration/

context.description: The name of the context in KubeConfig

control_plane_containers.description: The list of control-plane node container names

image.description: The image to use for the kind nodes. corresponds to the --image flag on the cli.

image_version.description: Kubernetes major.minor version, which chooses the correct node image from the published SHAs matching this version of KIND

kubeconfig.description: The full text of the kubeconfig that can be used to connect to this cluster

kubeconfig_internal.description: The full text of the kubeconfig that can be used to connect to this cluster from inside the container network

name.description: the name of the cluster. corresponds to the --name flag on the kind cli.

nodes.description: The list of nodes that were provisioned for this cluster

ca_certificate_data.description: The base64-encoded CA Certificate used by the API Server

client_certificate_data.description: The base64-encoded client certificate data for connecting the cluster

client_key_data.description: The base64-encoded client private key data for connecting the cluster

context.description: The name of the context in KubeConfig

control_plane_containers.description: The list of control-plane node container names

kubeconfig.description: The full text of the kubeconfig that can be used to connect to this cluster

kubeconfig_internal.description: The full text of the kubeconfig that can be used to connect to this cluster from inside the container network

nodes.description: The list of nodes that were provisioned for this cluster
